Package bt.data

Class Bitfield

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.Bitfield

  • public class Bitfield
extends Object
    Status of torrent's data. Instances of this class are thread-safe.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Bitfield.PieceStatus
      Status of a particular piece.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Bitfield​(byte[] value, int piecesTotal)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.7 in favor of Bitfield(byte[], BitOrder, int)
      Bitfield​(byte[] value, BitOrder bitOrder, int piecesTotal)
      Creates bitfield based on a bitmask.
      Bitfield​(int piecesTotal)
      Creates empty bitfield.
      Bitfield​(List<ChunkDescriptor> chunks)
      Creates "local" bitfield from a list of chunk descriptors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bitfield

        public Bitfield​(List<ChunkDescriptor> chunks)
        Creates "local" bitfield from a list of chunk descriptors.
        Parameters:
        chunks - List of torrent's chunk descriptors.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Bitfield

        public Bitfield​(int piecesTotal)
        Creates empty bitfield. Useful when peer does not communicate its' bitfield (e.g. when he has no data).
        Parameters:
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Bitfield

        @Deprecated
public Bitfield​(byte[] value,
                int piecesTotal)
        Deprecated. since 1.7 in favor of Bitfield(byte[], BitOrder, int)
        Creates bitfield based on a bitmask. Used for creating peers' bitfields. Bitmask must be in the format described in BEP-3 (little-endian order of bits).
        Parameters:
        value - Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If position i is set to 1, then piece with index i is complete and verified.
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Bitfield

        public Bitfield​(byte[] value,
                BitOrder bitOrder,
                int piecesTotal)
        Creates bitfield based on a bitmask. Used for creating peers' bitfields.
        Parameters:
        value - Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If position i is set to 1, then piece with index i is complete and verified.
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.7

    • Method Detail

      • getBitmask

        public BitSet getBitmask​()
        Returns:
        Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece is in Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED status.
        Since:
        1.7

      • getSkippedBitmask

        public BitSet getSkippedBitmask​()
        Returns:
        Bitmask of skipped pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece should be skipped.
        Since:
        1.8

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray​(BitOrder bitOrder)
        Parameters:
        bitOrder - Order of bits to use to create the byte array
        Returns:
        Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece is in Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED status.
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPiecesTotal

        public int getPiecesTotal​()
        Returns:
        Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesComplete

        public int getPiecesComplete​()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that have status Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesIncomplete

        public int getPiecesIncomplete​()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that have status different Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED.
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPiecesRemaining

        public int getPiecesRemaining​()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that have status different from Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED and should NOT be skipped.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesSkipped

        public int getPiecesSkipped​()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that should be skipped
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPiecesNotSkipped

        public int getPiecesNotSkipped​()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that should NOT be skipped
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPieceStatus

        public Bitfield.PieceStatus getPieceStatus​(int pieceIndex)
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Returns:
        Status of the corresponding piece.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        DataDescriptor.getChunkDescriptors()

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete​(int pieceIndex)
        Shortcut method to find out if the piece has been downloaded.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Returns:
        true if the piece has been downloaded
        Since:
        1.1

      • isVerified

        public boolean isVerified​(int pieceIndex)
        Shortcut method to find out if the piece has been downloaded and verified.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Returns:
        true if the piece has been downloaded and verified
        Since:
        1.1
